00071 } mmtz_column;

00073 /* info about mtz dataset */
00074 typedef struct mmtz_dataset_ {

00077 } mmtz_dataset;

00079 /* info about mtz crystal */
00080 typedef struct mmtz_crystal_ {

00083   char pname[65];
00084 } mmtz_crystal;
